description:
As Ichigo continues his Bankai training, Renji emerges from his own Bankai training to save Rukia.  But standing in his way is none other than his own captain -- Byakuya Kuchiki.  Does Renji have the strength to defeat his one-time comrade or will he be ripped to shreds?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Renji, Tama no Chikai! Byakuya to no Shitou
Renji, Vow to his Soul! Battle to the Death with Byakuya
Renji, le serment de l`âme ! Rencontre mortelle avec Byakuya
恋次, 魂の誓い! 白哉との死闘
